level.heading: Name.
level.text: A captive insurer shall not use or adopt a name that is the same as, deceptively similar to, or likely to be confused with or mistaken for any other insurer licensed in the District.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 11 of Captive Insurance Company Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-640, November 30, 2004, 52 DCR 1238).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 15-262, see notes following ยง 31-3931.01.
